title: Erin Brockovich (2000)
explanation: This plot aligns well with the user's preferences, as it features a strong female lead, Erin Brockovich, who embarks on a journey of discovery and empowerment. While it's not a traditional road trip movie, Erin's exploration of the Hinkley community and uncovering the truth about PG&E's contamination can be seen as a metaphorical road trip. The film also highlights female friendship and empowerment through Erin's relationships with the Hinkley residents and her lawyer, Ed Masry.
